content.question: ​Boyle’s Law states that the pressure of a gas is inversely proportional to the volume of the gas at a constant temperature. The table gives the volume <math alttext="V"><mi>V</mi></math>, in milliliters (mL), of a gas for selected pressures <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math>. Which of the following gives a model for the volume of the gas as a function of pressure? (Note: the units for pressure are not included.)

choices.label: ​<math alttext="V open parentheses P close parentheses equals 11.458 P"><mi>V</mi><mfenced><mi>P</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>11.458</mn><mi>P</mi></math>
​<math alttext="V open parentheses P close parentheses equals 1650 P"><mi>V</mi><mfenced><mi>P</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>1650</mn><mi>P</mi></math>

​<math alttext="V open parentheses P close parentheses equals fraction numerator 11.458 over denominator P end fraction"><mi>V</mi><mfenced><mi>P</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>11.458</mn><mi>P</mi></mfrac></math>
​<math alttext="V open parentheses P close parentheses equals 1650 over P"><mi>V</mi><mfenced><mi>P</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1650</mn><mi>P</mi></mfrac></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="V open parentheses P close parentheses equals 1650 over P"><mi>V</mi><mfenced><mi>P</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1650</mn><mi>P</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
